def_cn: （与…）融洽，和谐，与…协调一致
def_en: If two or more things harmonize with each other, they fit in well with each other.

def_cn: 使（法律、制度或规则）协调;使统一
def_en: When governments or organizations harmonize laws, systems, or regulations, they agree in a friendly way to make them the same or similar.

def_cn: 用和声唱（或演奏）;为（主调）配和声
def_en: When people harmonize, they sing or play notes which are different from the main tune but which sound nice with it.
